ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-08-23
          -1st deliberation. The bill amends the Access Devices Regulation Act, an offshoot of the hacking, scheming and other malpractices issues on BPI and BDO. Approved in consolidation with HB 5934.
      2. Committee Report filed on 2017-11-23
          -Committee Report 490 Substitute Bill 6710
MOTHER BILL: HB06710
